notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: id like to give this hexproof

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: That card is a conversation of its own lol // But I agree // With the idea of your statement // It honestly feels like a sorcery which should make a custom token or emblem // The fact that it is an artifact is so bank

notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: i guess // idk i think it's fine as an artifact but it needs hexproof

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: I disagree, but I agree it should have hexproof

notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: do you think it should be colored?

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: No it should be colorless // The ultimate meme card

notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: I guess it could work as a sorcery, but I feel like the end '2 life less' thing is an artifact

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: Or we could make it gain you a ton of life, and avoid adding a permanent necessary clause to it

notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: I don't love the gain a bunch of life approach tbh, I think it being a permanent advantage is good

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: we'll stick with that // i want to talk about making a token tho // since the effect is very much a spell or a challenge

notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: mayyyyybe it could give an emblem

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: or just maybe like, make an artifact token with hexproof and indestructible that has the same effect // or just an emblem lol
